name: Lawst VR
description:
You are part of a team testing the new Theory of Teleportation. Each of you is assigned to a trial room where your only instructions are to take two pills and go to sleep when you're ready. The implant in your brain has Trial Room 1 set as the target, so that's where you expect to wake up. But something wakes you up prematurely, and that's when things start to get weird.

Can be played without a Google VR headset.
